channel.title: Object Oriented Programming on David J Nevin
channel.description: Recent content in Object Oriented Programming on David J Nevin

item.title: Where I'm at
item.description: It’s been a full few days The Educative OOP course is almost done.

item.title: Implementing A Child Class
item.description: A Banking Class Example Following the tutorials in Educative I wrote my first class with inheritance.

item.title: Inheritance
item.description: Parent Class Parent Class (Super Class or Base Class): This class allows the reuse of its public properties in another class.

item.title: Information Hiding
item.description: Information Hiding The process of hiding the ‘inner workings’ of a method or class by providing only an interface to access the object.

item.title: Classes and Objects
item.description: Classes and Methods: Some Notes If you don’t initialize the values of properties, the code will not compile.
